verses.text: \w Adam|strong="H0121"\w*, \w Sheth|strong="H8352"\w*, \w Enosh|strong="H0583"\w*,
\w Kenan|strong="H7018"\w*, \w Mahalaleel|strong="H4111"\w*, \w Jered|strong="H3382"\w*,
\w Henoch|strong="H2585"\w*, \w Methuselah|strong="H4968"\w*, \w Lamech|strong="H3929"\w*,
\w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*, \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w*, and \w Japheth|strong="H3315"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Japheth|strong="H3315"\w*; \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w*, and \w Magog|strong="H4031"\w*, and \w Madai|strong="H4074"\w*, and \w Javan|strong="H3120"\w*, and \w Tubal|strong="H8422"\w*, and \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w*, and \w Tiras|strong="H8494"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gomer|strong="H1586"\w*; \w Ashchenaz|strong="H0813"\w*, and \w Riphath|strong="H7384"\w*, and \w Togarmah|strong="H8425"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft Riphath: or, Diphath as it is in some copies\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Javan|strong="H3120"\w*; \w Elishah|strong="H0473"\w*, and \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*, \w Kittim|strong="H3794"\w*, and \w Dodanim|strong="H1721"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft Dodanim: or, Rodanim, according to some copies\f*
¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ham|strong="H2526"\w*; \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*, and \w Mizraim|strong="H4714"\w*, \w Put|strong="H6316"\w*, and \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*; \w Seba|strong="H5434"\w*, and \w Havilah|strong="H2341"\w*, and \w Sabta|strong="H5454"\w*, and \w Raamah|strong="H7484"\w*, and \w Sabtecha|strong="H5455"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Raamah|strong="H7484"\w*; \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w*, and \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w*.
And \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Nimrod|strong="H5248"\w*: he \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to be \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
And \w Mizraim|strong="H4714"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Ludim|strong="H3866"\w*, and \w Anamim|strong="H6047"\w*, and \w Lehabim|strong="H3853"\w*, and \w Naphtuhim|strong="H5320"\w*,
And \w Pathrusim|strong="H6625"\w*, and \w Casluhim|strong="H3695"\w*, (of whom \w came|strong="H3318"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*,) and \w Caphthorim|strong="H3732"\w*.
And \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and \w Heth|strong="H2845"\w*,
The \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w* also, and the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Girgashite|strong="H1622"\w*,
And the \w Hivite|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Arkite|strong="H6208"\w*, and the \w Sinite|strong="H5513"\w*,
And the \w Arvadite|strong="H0721"\w*, and the \w Zemarite|strong="H6786"\w*, and the \w Hamathite|strong="H2577"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*; \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, and \w Asshur|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w Arphaxad|strong="H0775"\w*, and \w Lud|strong="H3865"\w*, and \w Aram|strong="H0758"\w*, and \w Uz|strong="H5780"\w*, and \w Hul|strong="H2343"\w*, and \w Gether|strong="H1666"\w*, and \w Meshech|strong="H4902"\w*.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft Meshech: or, Mash\f*
And \w Arphaxad|strong="H0775"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shelah|strong="H7974"\w*, and \w Shelah|strong="H7974"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Eber|strong="H5677"\w*.

And unto \w Eber|strong="H5677"\w* were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Peleg|strong="H6389"\w*; because in his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* was \w divided|strong="H6385"\w*: and his \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Joktan|strong="H3355"\w*.\f + \fr 1.19 \ft Peleg: that is, division\f*
And \w Joktan|strong="H3355"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Almodad|strong="H0486"\w*, and \w Sheleph|strong="H8026"\w*, and \w Hazarmaveth|strong="H2700"\w*, and \w Jerah|strong="H3392"\w*,
\w Hadoram|strong="H1913"\w* also, and \w Uzal|strong="H0187"\w*, and \w Diklah|strong="H1853"\w*,
And \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*, and \w Abimael|strong="H0039"\w*, and \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w*,
And \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, and \w Havilah|strong="H2341"\w*, and \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w*. All these \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joktan|strong="H3355"\w*.
¶ \w Shem|strong="H8035"\w*, \w Arphaxad|strong="H0775"\w*, \w Shelah|strong="H7974"\w*,
\w Eber|strong="H5677"\w*, \w Peleg|strong="H6389"\w*, \w Reu|strong="H7466"\w*,
\w Serug|strong="H8286"\w*, \w Nahor|strong="H5152"\w*, \w Terah|strong="H8646"\w*,
\w Abram|strong="H0087"\w*; the same \add is\add* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*.
The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*; \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*.

¶ These \add are\add* their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*: The \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, \w Nebaioth|strong="H5032"\w*; then \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, and \w Adbeel|strong="H0110"\w*, and \w Mibsam|strong="H4017"\w*,
\w Mishma|strong="H4927"\w*, and \w Dumah|strong="H1746"\w*, \w Massa|strong="H4854"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H2301"\w*, and \w Tema|strong="H8485"\w*,\f + \fr 1.30 \ft Hadad: also called, Hadar\f*
\w Jetur|strong="H3195"\w*, \w Naphish|strong="H5305"\w*, and \w Kedemah|strong="H6929"\w*. These are the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*.

¶ Now the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Keturah|strong="H6989"\w*, \w Abraham’s|strong="H0085"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*: she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zimran|strong="H2175"\w*, and \w Jokshan|strong="H3370"\w*, and \w Medan|strong="H4091"\w*, and \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, and \w Ishbak|strong="H3435"\w*, and \w Shuah|strong="H7744"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jokshan|strong="H3370"\w*; \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w*, and \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*; \w Ephah|strong="H5891"\w*, and \w Epher|strong="H6081"\w*, and \w Henoch|strong="H2585"\w*, and \w Abida|strong="H0028"\w*, and \w Eldaah|strong="H0420"\w*. All these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Keturah|strong="H6989"\w*.

And \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*. The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*; \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*; \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w*, \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*, and \w Jeush|strong="H3266"\w*, and \w Jaalam|strong="H3281"\w*, and \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w*; \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, and \w Omar|strong="H0201"\w*, \w Zephi|strong="H6825"\w*, and \w Gatam|strong="H1609"\w*, \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*, and \w Timna|strong="H8555"\w*, and \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*.\f + \fr 1.36 \ft Zephi: or, Zepho\f*
The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*; \w Nahath|strong="H5184"\w*, \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, \w Shammah|strong="H8048"\w*, and \w Mizzah|strong="H4199"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*; \w Lotan|strong="H3877"\w*, and \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w*, and \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*, and \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*, and \w Dishon|strong="H1787"\w*, and \w Ezer|strong="H0687"\w*, and \w Dishan|strong="H1789"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Lotan|strong="H3877"\w*; \w Hori|strong="H2753"\w*, and \w Homam|strong="H1950"\w*: and \w Timna|strong="H8555"\w* \add was\add* \w Lotan’s|strong="H3877"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.\f + \fr 1.39 \ft Homam: or, Hemam\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shobal|strong="H7732"\w*; \w Alian|strong="H5935"\w*, and \w Manahath|strong="H4506"\w*, and \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*, \w Shephi|strong="H8195"\w*, and \w Onam|strong="H0208"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zibeon|strong="H6649"\w*; \w Aiah|strong="H0345"\w*, and \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*.\f + \fr 1.40 \ft Alian: also called, Alvan\f*\f + \fr 1.40 \ft Shephi: also called, Shepho\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anah|strong="H6034"\w*; \w Dishon|strong="H1787"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dishon|strong="H1787"\w*; \w Amram|strong="H2566"\w*, and \w Eshban|strong="H0790"\w*, and \w Ithran|strong="H3506"\w*, and \w Cheran|strong="H3763"\w*.\f + \fr 1.41 \ft Amram: or, Hemdan\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ezer|strong="H0687"\w*; \w Bilhan|strong="H1092"\w*, and \w Zavan|strong="H2190"\w*, \add and\add* \w Jakan|strong="H3292"\w*. The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dishan|strong="H1789"\w*; \w Uz|strong="H5780"\w*, and \w Aran|strong="H0765"\w*.\f + \fr 1.42 \ft Jakan: or, Akan\f*

¶ Now these \add are\add* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* that \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add any\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w*: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add was\add* \w Dinhabah|strong="H1838"\w*.

And when \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* of \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And when \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Husham|strong="H2367"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Temanites|strong="H8489"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And when \w Husham|strong="H2367"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bedad|strong="H0911"\w*, which \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add was\add* \w Avith|strong="H5762"\w*.
And when \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Samlah|strong="H8072"\w* of \w Masrekah|strong="H4957"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And when \w Samlah|strong="H8072"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w* of \w Rehoboth|strong="H7344"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And when \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Baal-hanan|strong="H1177"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

And when \w Baal-hanan|strong="H1177"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add was\add* \w Pai|strong="H6464"\w*; and his \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Mehetabel|strong="H4105"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Matred|strong="H4308"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Mezahab|strong="H4314"\w*.\f + \fr 1.50 \ft Hadad: or, Hadar\f*\f + \fr 1.50 \ft Pai: or, Pau\f*

¶ \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* also. And the \w dukes|strong="H0441"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* were; \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Timnah|strong="H8555"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Aliah|strong="H5933"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Jetheth|strong="H3509"\w*,
\w Duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Aholibamah|strong="H0173"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Pinon|strong="H6373"\w*,
\w Duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Mibzar|strong="H4014"\w*,
\w Duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Magdiel|strong="H4025"\w*, \w duke|strong="H0441"\w* \w Iram|strong="H5902"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w dukes|strong="H0441"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.
